text: The Mixed 4 × 400 metres relay competition at the 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta was held on 28 August 2018 at the Gelora Bung Karno Stadium. This event made its debut in 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta. India claimed the gold medal in this event, Kazakhstan and China took silver and bronze medals respectively. Bahrain originally won the gold medal and Athletics Federation of India lodged protest against Bahrain for causing obstruction to Hima Das during the Mixed 4x400 relay final. After passing on the baton to Salwa Eid Naser, Bahrain's Kemi Adekoya fell before Hima Das obstructing her way. However, the protest was rejected by the Asian Games' Jury of Appeals and India's silver medal was not upgraded to gold. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | Tuesday, 28 August 2018 || 20:45 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || align=left| Muhammed Anas M. R. title: Athletics at the 2018 Asian Games – Mixed 4 × 400 metres relay
